hero.title: Innovate with technology.
hero.description: We provide access to technology to those who need it most.

about.title: Learn from industry experts who will dedicate their time to you
about.description: Take part in events and programs designed by industry experts, and apply your knowledge to real-world projects to acquire valuable skills. Build an impressive portfolio to be prepared for your job search.

separator-1.title: Youth Training and Development at Soracert: A Journey Towards Excellence.
separator-1.description: At Soracert, we offer a unique journey for young technology enthusiasts, combining training and personalized support. Our inspiring and immersive programs enable each participant to strengthen their skills, build confidence, and prepare for success in a rapidly growing industry.

separator-2.title: Discover how Soracert has transformed the lives of young technology enthusiasts
separator-2.description: Through our programs, workshops, and bootcamps, Soracert helps each participant unlock their potential and reach new heights in the world of technology. Read inspiring testimonials from those who have experienced a true transformation, enhancing their skills and confidence to build a promising future.

howitwork.title: We help young people launch their careers
howitwork.description: Since 2020, we have made a significant impact on the ecosystem by training and offering scholarships to thousands of young Africans.

howitwork.title: Certification & Scholarships
howitwork.description: We offer recognized certifications and scholarships for international training programs.

howitwork.title: Community
howitwork.description: We are a community of technology and innovation enthusiasts.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to create an inclusive space where members feel supported, inspired, and encouraged to pursue their passion or cause. We aim to promote the exchange of information, personal growth, and skill development within our community. We aspire to have a positive impact on our society by fostering collective action for important causes.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We aspire to become the leading global tech community, maximizing the potential of technology to pave new paths for development and growth. We envision a future where our community actively contributes to a more inclusive, educated, and sustainable world.

ourteam.title: Meet Our Leadership Team
ourteam.description: At Soracert, our leadership is built on a dedicated team of experienced and passionate professionals. Together, they drive our vision to deliver innovative and reliable solutions. Discover the people behind our success.

history.title: Our Story
history.description: SoraCert has always been able to connect trust with innovation throughout its history.
